page.title: 06TROUT FARM
page.content: Fresh{trout}is advertised on several roads leading to Donnington Trout Farm. The farm was established 6 or 7 years ago because there was a{spring providing plenty of fresh water at a constant temperature. There are millions of trout varying in size and age. Some are sold at 3 months to be brought on at another trout farm. When they are larger, over 8 ounces up to several pounds in weight they are sold for{eating.}They are electrocuted in a special bath.{Anglers}can pay to spend the day fishing for trout in the lake below the farm and are allowed up to 5 fish a day. The fish are fed on pellets of dried fish protein. Current prices are Â£1.25 a pound whole or Â£1.35 a pound gutted.
